con:settings.con:setting: <xml-fragment xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config"> <con:entry key="Environment" value="Default"/> <con:entry key="Global Properties" value=""/> <con:entry key="TestSuite" value="Scorex API TestSuite"/> <con:entry key="Password" value=""/> <con:entry key="TestRunner Path" value=""/> <con:entry key="Tool Args" value=""/> <con:entry key="Ignore Errors" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Host:Port" value=""/> <con:entry key="user-settings.xml Password" value=""/> <con:entry key="WSS Password Type" value=""/> <con:entry key="Save Project" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Enable UI" value="false"/> <con:entry key="System Properties" value=""/> <con:entry key="Domain" value=""/> <con:entry key="Coverage Report" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Export JUnit Results" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Export JUnit Results with test properties" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Open Report" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Project Properties" value=""/> <con:entry key="Export All" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Project Password" value=""/> <con:entry key="Report Format(s)" value=""/> <con:entry key="TestCase" value="/addresses/balance/{address} TestCase"/> <con:entry key="Print Report" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Username" value=""/> <con:entry key="Root Folder" value=""/> <con:entry key="Select Report Type" value=""/> <con:entry key="Save After" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Add Settings" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Endpoint" value=""/> </xml-fragment>

con:interface.name: Scorex API
con:interface.con:description: The Web Interface to the Scorex API

con:method.name: root
con:method.con:description: Get wallet accounts addresses Addresses

con:method.name: create
con:method.con:description: Create a new account in the wallet(if it exists) Create

con:method.name: balance
con:method.con:description: Account's balance Balance

con:method.name: confirmationBalance
con:method.con:description: Balance of {address} after {confirmations} Confirmed balance

con:method.name: seed
con:method.con:description: Export seed value for the {address} Seed

con:method.name: seq
con:method.con:description: Get wallet accounts addresses Seq

con:method.name: sign
con:method.con:description: Sign a message with a private key associated with {address} Sign

con:method.name: signText
con:method.con:description: Sign a message with a private key associated with {address} Sign

con:method.name: validate
con:method.con:description: Check whether address {address} is valid or not Validate

con:method.name: verify
con:method.con:description: Check a signature of a message signed by an account Verify

con:method.name: verifyText
con:method.con:description: Check a signature of a message signed by an account Verify text

con:method.name: deleteAddress
con:method.con:description: Remove the account with address {address} from the wallet Delete

con:method.name: balances
con:method.con:description: Account's balances for all assets Account's balance

con:method.name: balance
con:method.con:description: Account's balance by given asset Asset's balance

con:method.name: issue
con:method.con:description: Publish signed Asset issue transaction to the Blockchain Broadcast signed Asset issue

con:method.name: reissue
con:method.con:description: Publish signed Asset reissue transaction to the Blockchain Broadcast signed Asset reissue

con:method.name: transfer
con:method.con:description: Publish signed Asset transfer transaction to the Blockchain Broadcast signed Asset transfer

con:method.name: issue
con:method.con:description: Issue new Asset Issue Asset

con:method.name: reissue
con:method.con:description: Reissue Asset Issue Asset

con:method.name: transfer
con:method.con:description: Transfer asset to new address Transfer asset

con:method.name: address
con:method.con:description: Get list of blocks generated by specified address Address

con:method.name: at
con:method.con:description: Get block at specified height At

con:method.name: checkpoint
con:method.con:description: Broadcast checkpoint of blocks Checkpoint

con:method.name: child
con:method.con:description: Get children of specified block Child

con:method.name: delay
con:method.con:description: Average delay in milliseconds between last $blockNum blocks starting from block with $signature Average delay

con:parameter.con:name: blockNum
con:parameter.con:description: Number of blocks to count delay

con:method.name: first
con:method.con:description: Get genesis block data First

con:method.name: height
con:method.con:description: Get blockchain height Height

con:method.name: heightEncoded
con:method.con:description: Get height of a block by its Base58-encoded signature Height

con:method.name: last
con:method.con:description: Get last block data Last

con:method.name: seq
con:method.con:description: Get block at specified heights Seq

con:method.name: signature
con:method.con:description: Get block by a specified Base58-encoded signature Signature

con:method.name: algo
con:method.con:description: Shows which consensus algo being using Consensus algo

con:method.name: basetarget
con:method.con:description: Base target of a last block Base target last

con:method.name: baseTargetId
con:method.con:description: base target of a block with specified id Base target

con:method.name: generatingBalance
con:method.con:description: Account's generating balance(the same as balance atm) Generating balance

con:method.name: generationSignature
con:method.con:description: Generation signature of a last block Generation signature last

con:method.name: generationSignatureId
con:method.con:description: Generation signature of a block with specified id Generation signature

con:method.name: blocks
con:method.con:description: Get sizes and full hashes for last blocks Blocks

con:parameter.con:name: howMany
con:parameter.con:description: How many last blocks to take

con:method.name: info
con:method.con:description: All info you need to debug State

con:method.name: getSettings
con:method.con:description: Settings file State

con:method.name: state
con:method.con:description: Get current state State

con:method.name: stateAt
con:method.con:description: Get state at specified height State at block

con:method.name: status
con:method.con:description: Get status of the running core Status

con:method.name: stop
con:method.con:description: Stop the node Stop

con:method.name: version
con:method.con:description: Get Waves node version Version

con:method.name: payment
con:method.con:description: Send payment to another wallet Send payment

con:method.name: allPeers
con:method.con:description: Peer list Peer list

con:method.name: blacklistedPeers
con:method.con:description: Connected peers list Blacklisted peers list

con:method.name: connect
con:method.con:description: Connect to peer Connect to peer

con:method.name: connectedPeers
con:method.con:description: Connected peers list Connected peers list

con:method.name: addressLimit
con:method.con:description: Get list of transactions where specified address has been involved Address

con:parameter.con:name: limit
con:parameter.con:description: Specified number of records to be returned

con:method.name: info
con:method.con:description: Get transaction info Info

con:method.name: unconfirmed
con:method.con:description: Get list of unconfirmed transactions Unconfirmed

con:method.name: hashSecure
con:method.con:description: Return SecureCryptographicHash of specified message Hash

con:method.name: hashFast
con:method.con:description: Return FastCryptographicHash of specified message Hash

con:method.name: seedRoute
con:method.con:description: Generate random seed Seed

con:method.name: length
con:method.con:description: Generate random seed of specified length Seed of specified length

con:method.name: root
con:method.con:description: Display whether wallet exists or not Wallet

con:method.name: seed
con:method.con:description: Export wallet seed Seed

con:method.name: address
con:method.con:description: Generate a address from public key Generate

con:method.name: broadcastSignedPayment
con:method.con:description: Publish signed payment to the Blockchain Broadcast signed payment

con:method.name: createdSignedPayment
con:method.con:description: Sign payment by provided wallet seed Sign payment

con:method.name: externalPayment
con:method.con:description: Publish signed payment to the Blockchain Broadcast payment

con:method.name: payment
con:method.con:description: Send payment from wallet to another wallet. Each call sends new payment Send payment from wallet

con:method.name: signPayment
con:method.con:description: Create unique payment signed by address from wallet. Without broadcasting to network. Create payment signed by address from wallet
